Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: Draw two students who are accurately using a string telephone to communicate over a distance with clear depiction of the setup.
Include specific features of the string telephone, such as the cups or cans and tightly drawn string, to show how it uses sound to communicate.
Demonstrate that the device can send or receive information over a distance by clearly showing the string connecting the two devices.
Illustrate how people can communicate over long distances using simple materials, by effectively depicting the string stretched between two points.
Show or label the sound waves traveling through the string, indicating how information is being communicated, using arrows or sound wave symbols.
CANNOT: May have minor gaps such as forgetting to label one element or misplace an arrow (e.g., not indicating sound direction clearly).
Occasionally may not perfectly align the string if focusing on detailed representation of students (slight oversight).
